title: Gamelockup yet I get leaverbuster
body: How is it fair that your patch causes my computer to lockup when loading a game causing me to get an automatic leaverbuster.................................................................................................................... u people have no common sense on how to manage ur bugs

replies.body:
Disconnections from a match negatively affect everyone in it, regardless of the reason for the disconnection. This is a big reason why the [Leaverbuster system](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) treats all disconnections equally and why penalties cannot be removed or modified.

Since patches only deal with local files inside the League directory, they're *very unlikely* to caused whole system lockups. When a system locks up, it's generally caused by either malfunctioning drivers or hardware. Our [bugsplat & crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) goes over the first steps to take in troubleshooting this issue. 

Let me know if that guide caused any change.
